programme.desc: Quando um inimigo invisvel ameaa a humanidade assumindo seus corpos e apagando suas memrias, Melanie Stryder arrisca tudo para proteger as pessoas com quem se importa.

programme.title: Guerra Aliengena, (2023, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma teoria sobre aliengenas diz que os extraterrestres Greys vivem em guerra com outras espcies do universo para proteger a Terra.

programme.title: A Colnia, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Em 2018, depois de um desastre pela mudana climtica que levou a uma nova idade do gelo, um clandesttino reduto de sobreviventes devem lutar para preservar a humanidade de uma ameaa mais selvagem do que os elementos.

programme.title: Voo 7500, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Um voo sai dos Estados Unidos para o Japo, durante as dez horas de voo os passageiros pensam em como se distrair ... at perceberem uma presena estranha e sobrenatural dentro do avio.

programme.title: Cubo Zero, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Oito estranhos acordam em uma estranha sala em forma de cubo sem nenhuma lembrana de como eles chegaram l.

programme.title: Timecop: O Guardio do Tempo, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, um oficial de uma agncia de segurana que regula as viagens no tempo, deve lutar por sua vida contra um poltico sombrio que pretende mudar o passado para controlar o futuro.

programme.title: Malcolm X, (1993, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: O lder afro-americano Malcolm X tem o pai assassinado pela Klu Klux Klan e sua me internada por insanidade. Preso aos 20 anos de idade, Malcolm se converte ao islamismo e passa a pregar seus ideais.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: No fim do sculo 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violncia crescendo, at tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu.

programme.title: Conspirao Fatal, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de ser preso e ter sua reputao na Fora Area manchada, um piloto veterano foge da cadeia e parte em busca do verdadeiro criminoso. Ele, ento, descobre uma conspirao terrorista em andamento e somente ele poder evitar um desastre.

programme.title: Cidade do dio, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Roy um ladro aposentado que se une ao seu irmo e dois cmplices para um ltimo trabalho, assaltar uma joalheria. O assalto d certo, mas ele trado por um dos bandidos, que mata seu irmo. Roy agora quer se vingar do antigo comparsa.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: Police Story: A Guerra das Drogas, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Ka Kui (Jackie Chan) prende um chefe do crime, mas a secretria o trai para libert-lo. Alm disso, ele lida com a namorada ciumenta.

programme.title: Timecop: O Guardio do Tempo, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, um oficial de uma agncia de segurana que regula as viagens no tempo, deve lutar por sua vida contra um poltico sombrio que pretende mudar o passado para controlar o futuro.

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico.

programme.title: Atormentado pelo passado, (2020, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Um homem luta para chegar a um acordo com a insegurana paralisante e os resduos de seu abuso sexual na infncia nas mos de um padre confivel e respeitado.

programme.title: O Chamado de Deus, (2015, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Uma jovem problemtica que trabalha em um call center de oraes faz a diferena na vida de outras pessoas, o que a faz lidar com seu passado conturbado quando finalmente um dia percebe a f.

programme.title: A rvore Da Vida, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de uma famlia em Waco, Texas, em 1956. O filho mais velho testemunha a perda da inocncia e luta com os ensinamentos conflitantes de seus pais.

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: Prisioneiras Nunca Mais, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Inspirada em acontecimentos reais, Prisioneiras Nunca Mais conta a histria de Aggie, em busca de suas duas afilhadas, sequestradas pelo pai para serem vendidas como escravas. O filme um drama sobre a realidade do trfico humano.

programme.title: Betty e Coretta, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mes solteiras aps o assassinato de seus maridos.

programme.title: Poder Alm da Vida, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dan Millman um atleta que tem dinheiro, mulheres perseguindo-o e aptides para participar das Olimpadas. Mas um encontro com Scrates, um homem que questiona tudo, faz sua viso de mundo mudar completamente.

programme.title: O Amor Nunca Morre, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois de anos afastado dos amigos e familiares, produtor musical com a vida pessoal e profissional em frangalhos volta para casa na Carolina do Norte para cuidar do pai doente, num difcil reencontro com questes do passado.

programme.title: Procura da Liberdade, (2021, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Dois homens separados por 100 anos esto unidos em sua busca pela liberdade. Em 1856, um escravo, Samuel Woodward e sua famlia, escapam da Plantao Monroe perto de Richmond, Virgnia.

programme.title: Macgaren e o monstro Moke criam um esquema ilegal para arrecadar fundos e roubar jovens precisando de dinheiro.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Os piratas espaciais, irmos Gasami, Trazem Koko e Namaguederaz para a Terra. Eles fazem Namaguederaz de refm e obrigam Koko engana Jaspion.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Gasami 1 planeja atacar Jaspion com a ajuda do monstro Bogan, trazido exclusivamente para destruir o Gigante Daileon.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Um trio de vilhes chamadas "As Graciosas" atrai jovens para uma danceteria e os envenena com uma poo, transformando-os em lobisomens.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: O cientista espacial Aigamen junta-se a Macgaren e estuda como derrotar Jaspion e Daileon.
programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Um poderoso inimigo, o Imprio Crisis, surgiu de repente e est planejando dizimar toda a raa humana. O alvo principal deles Issamu Minami. Um milagre acontece no corpo de Issamu, que acabou perdendo sua habilidade de se transformar.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Heris costumam renascer. Uma nova aventura comea para Issamu Minami cuja misso lutar contra o gigante Imprio Crisis. O desafio do mundo das trevas prescrito... Um carro misterioso vai com tudo para cima de Issamu.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: O Cavaleiro do Vento, Gainagiskan, enviado pelo Almirante Bosgan. O que Issamu v ao ser tragado para o Mundo Kaima? E o que o diagrama salvo em um disquete que fora confiado a Issamu?
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX
programme.sub-title: RX Contra o Cavaleiro do Vento

programme.title: Issamu descansa e tem um sonho: a concluso da super mquina que corre na velocidade da luz, No entanto, o Imprio Crisis envia seu mensageiro do momento, o Rob Kaima Gangaden, para destruir Ridron.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Ele, que possui velocidade mxima de 1500km/h, a super mquina Ridron, corre com tudo para socorrer Reiko e seus amigos, sequestrados pelo Guerreiro Kaima Gainagamus.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Shigeru fez uma promessa: ficar amigo do Monstro Kaima Kurukuruten. No entanto, Kurukuruten deu a ele uma terrvel ordem: eliminar a humanidade. RX chega para lidar com essa situao, derrotando o ardiloso Kurukuruten.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Yusuke Morita, amigo de infncia de Issamu, est em fuga. Os Demnios do Imprio Crisis foram enviados para recuperar o projeto de uma arma secreta: um satlite de gs venenoso.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Existe um segredo por trs de Tomoko Kishida, uma garota super dotada. Ela fruto da relao de uma mulher humana com um Crisiano, descendente de Crisis, possuindo poderes ocultos.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX
programme.sub-title: O Segredo de Papai e Mame

programme.title: Varias exploses acontecem em diversas fbricas e indstrias do Japo. Bakunin Homem Mssil acusado de ser o responsvel, mas Tetsuzan sabe que no pode ser ele.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: O ninja turco Haburamu encontra uma espada macabra em catacumbas na Turquia. Sem querer, ressuscita a ninja bruxa Luana que quer transformar o mundo em um mar de sangue.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 15 - A Maldio Lendria Manin Luana (Manin Shirubia) Rnin Haburamu

programme.title: A Unidade de Ninjas Especiais da Famlia dos Feiticeiros criada para derrotar Jiraiya definitivamente. Eles so FIre, Water, Tree, Land e Stormin. Ao mesmo tempo Toha recebe do Dr. Smith uma verso mais moderna de seu carro, o Black Storm.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 16 - A Cruzada dos Ninjas Unidade de Ninjas Especiais (Fire, Water, Tree, Land e Stormin/Kazenin Mafia [Storm]) Tha(Jiraiya)

programme.title: Toha e Manabu fazem uma viagem em busca da diablica armadura Sat que corrompe o esprito do usurio. Tetsuzan teme que algum mal possa estar prximo.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 17 - A Estrela das Trevas Yuji (No original, Kurosaru "Macaco Preto")/Satan Ashura Hananin Agnes (Hananin Yumeha)

programme.title: A batalha contra Sat se torna mais intensa. Tetsuzan aparece para ajudar Jiraiya e Agnes. Dokusai trado por Sat e tambm jura vingana.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 18 - A Vingana de Agnes Satan Ashura Tha(Jiraiya) e Hananin Agnes

programme.title: Dokusai recruta Kenin Parchis, o mestre dos disfarces, justamente quando Tetsuzan est no exterior participando de um torneio. Logo depois um ganancioso corretor de imveis contacta o dojo Togakure.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: A Famlia de Feiticeiros vai ao oeste americano e pe a cabea de Jiraiya a prmio. O ninja pistoleiro Rainin Wild sai em busca dessa recompensa.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja

programme.title: Os carros e postos de gasolina da cidade esto tendo seus tanques esvaziados por um estranho dardo chamado Ira da Lua. O responsvel Seinin Alan, um ninja sagrado, protetor da natureza, que est sendo enganado pela Famlia dos Feiticeiros.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 21 - A Ira da Lua Seinin Allan

programme.title: Kei salva uma menina das valentonas da rua e assim faz uma nova amiga. A Famlia de Feiticeiros percebe uma chance de atingir Kei e planeja uma emboscada.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 22 - A Dimenso da Amizade Kenin Parchis Kei(Himenin Emiha)

programme.title: Diante de Touha, surge um novo inimigo e seu nome, estranhamente, Jiraiya. Qual a verdadeira identidade dele? Qual o segredo escondido por trs disso? Vestindo a Jiraiya Suit ele avana sobre o indefeso Touha. Touha ter chance de venc-lo?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 27 - Jiraiya, o inimigo de Toha (Nenhum) Tha(Jiraiya) e Yajir Iyo

programme.title: Afinal, quem sou eu? A chave o homem misterioso que aparece em Shinshu, no tempo de Togakushi. Quem o Akunobou Sugitani que esconde-se em meio montanha?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 28 - Quem sou eu? Adolf Sugitani (Sugitani Akunob) Tha(Jiraiya) e Tetsuzan Yamashi

programme.title: Esto de volta Homem Mssil, Wild e Baro Owl diante de Manabu que se anima no aprendizado afim de superar a real fora de Jiraiya. Ao mesmo tempo, um sussurro demonaco aproximasse do pequeno Manabu, que se torna vtima de uma cilada.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 29 - A Revolta do Pequeno Ninja (Nenhum) Manabu e Kazenin Storm

programme.title: Um dia a famlia Yamaji recebe a visita de um estranho velho. Qual passado sombrio esconde-se por trs dos incidentes na cidade? Um discpulo se afasta do mundo dos ninjas e abandona seu esprito e tornando-se maligno.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 30 - O Ninja Solitrio Aman Negro Tha(Jiraiya), Kei(Himenin Emiha), Manabu e Gensai Kochimura

programme.title: Surge a famosa espada de Nobutora, sentindo o seu cheiro Beni Lagarto e Parchis voltam a vida. Novamente uma mulher ninja e um grupo internacional de investigadores se envolvem em uma batalha. uma terrvel e magnfica luta.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 31 - A Espada de Shingen Kenin Parchis Tha(Jiraiya), Igynin Beni Lagarto , Rei Yagy(Kinin Reiha) e Katherine

programme.title: Surge a misteriosa sombra de uma mulher. Ser ela humana ou um fantasma? Estranhos acontecimentos na pousada das estudantes colegiais so investigados por Touha e Kei. Diante deles surge um conhecido nevoeiro.
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 32 - A Percepo Extrassensorial Otonin Uhaya e Famlia de Feiticeiros Kei(Himenin Emiha) e Mei

programme.title: Chega um telegrama de desafio do Rainin Wild. Uma covarde armadilha montada pelos Yonma e assim comea uma luta decisiva. No limite da batalha entre a arma e a espada qual ser a condio imposta?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 33 - A Guitarra Cobiada Tha(Jiraiya) e Rainin Wild

programme.title: Uma misteriosa luz envolve a famlia Yamaji . Qual ser o maior perigo de todos que o pote de herana prev? E qual ser o segredo da inscrio?
programme.desc: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja
programme.sub-title: 34 - A Caveira Assassina Monstro Feiticeiro Gomaz Famlia Yamashi e Rei Yagy(Kinin Reiha)

programme.title: Death Note
programme.desc: Light tem como objetivo investigar Kiyomi, enquanto os integrantes do corpo especial escutam pelo auto-falante.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai Sarutobi, prima de Konohamaru, incumbida de escoltar Kakashi, o Sexto Hokage, e seu amigo Might Guy at as fontes termais.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A misso de ranque S!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai e companhia chegam nas fontes termais na fronteira do Pas do Fogo com o Pas do Vapor, mas Mirai, que est sempre focada no trabalho, no consegue relaxar!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A guerra de ces e gatos!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps alguns dias de misso, Mirai vai nas fontes termais com Tenten, uma ex-aluna de Guy, mas o momento relaxante interrompido quando Guy grita que viu um fantasma.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O hotel amaldioado!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai, Kakashi e Guy viajam com Tatsumi para uma aldeia com uma fonte termal secreta, mas descobrem que a fonte foi tapada com uma pedra!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: Batatinhas e a pedra gigante!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Comovida com os esforos de Tatsumi para cumprir seu objetivo sozinha, Mirai decide dar uma pausa em sua misso e ajud-la.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: guas termais da ressurreio!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Camelia Vermelha
programme.desc: Para proteger guren da raivosa trs caudas, yukimaru usa poderes alm de seus limites. Comovida pela gesto dele, guren lamenta pelo seu pecado no passado de ter matado a me de yukimaru

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estranhos Companheiros
programme.desc: Para proteger yuukimaru, naruto e guren lutam lado a lado contra a besta de trs caudas e so tragados. Dentro da besta h um mundo antinatural cheio de calcrio

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Caminho Das Camlias
programme.desc: Os ninja da folha descobrem que naruto est dentro da besta de trs caudas. Sem outra alternativa seno confiar nos sentidos msticos de yuukimaru, kakashi e os outros seguem a orientao do menino e tentam uma misso de salvamento

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Contra Ataque Da Marca Da Maldio
programme.desc: Apesar da tentativa de salvamento, naruto e guren no retornam. A frustrao aumenta entre o grupo, mas quando a besta de trs caudas desperta de seu sono, a equipe de selamento faz uma segunda tentativa com a barreira de selamento de quatro pontas.
programme.sub-title: O Contra Ataque Da Marca Da Maldio

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Conscincia Culpada
programme.desc: Kabuto planeja fazer a trs caudas matar os ninja da folha sacrificando o poder e a vida de yuukimaru.

programme.title: Naruto: O ltimo Arranco : Um Ato Final De Desespero.
programme.desc: O chefe Jirocho espera, confiante na vitria de Idate. Mas Aoi, o ninja enviado pelo cl Wagarashi, bloqueia o caminho.
programme.sub-title: O ltimo Arranco : Um Ato Final De Desespero.

programme.title: Naruto: A Batalha Comea: Naruto Contra Sasuke !
programme.desc: Shikamaru promovido a chunin e comemora em um restaurante com sua equipe. No hospital, Lee decide em ter a cirurgia perigosa para curar seu corpo e continuar sendo um ninja.
programme.sub-title: A Batalha Comea: Naruto Contra Sasuke !

programme.title: Naruto: Rivais Amargos E Laos Desfeitos
programme.desc: Naruto e Sasuke usam suas melhores armas um contra o outro, e Kakashi chega para parar a luta bem a tempo.

programme.title: Naruto: Um Convite Do Som.
programme.desc: Os Quatro Ninja do Som, Kidomaru, Sakon, Jirobo e Tayuya, aparecem de repente diante de Sasuke. Sakura fica preocupada com a Marca da Maldio em Sasuke, colocada por Orochimaru.

programme.title: Naruto: Formao!A Equipe De Resgate De Sasuke
programme.desc: Sasuke ignora as splicas de Sakura e deixa a Aldeia Oculta da Folha. Ao saber disso, Tsunade invoca Shikamaru para lider-lo em sua primeira misso como chunin.

programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai, Kakashi e Guy viajam com Tatsumi para uma aldeia com uma fonte termal secreta, mas descobrem que a fonte foi tapada com uma pedra!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: Batatinhas e a pedra gigante!

programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman inherits an isolated mansion from a distant relative, but an unspeakable horror awaits her in the mansion's dank cellars.

programme.title: Darkness, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror film, from the director of [REC], a teenage girl (Anna Paquin) moves into a remote countryside house with her family, soon discovering horribly disturbing truths about the old place.

programme.title: The Uninvited, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: Based on Kim Jee-Woon's 2003 korean horror film. Story of two sisters returning home to their father from a mental institution, whose recovery is hindered by their cruel stepmother.

programme.title: Escape Room, (2017, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: For a birthday celebration, three couples partake in an ESCAPE ROOM, in which they must work together to solve puzzles in order to escape the roombut when the game turns deadly, they quickly learn the only winners are the survivors.

programme.title: Mom And Dad, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her little brother must survive a wild 24 hours during which a mass hysteria of unknown origins causes parents to turn violently on their own kids.

programme.title: The Babadook, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: In this terrifying thriller, a mother must protect her son from an evil, supernatural entity that has escaped the pages of a children's book and is lurking in their home.

programme.title: The Wolf of Snow Hollow, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: A small-town sheriff and his lackluster team of officers must solve a series of brutal murders that are occurring on the full moon. As he's consumed by the hunt for the killer, he struggles to remind himself that there's no such thing as werewolves

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Heather Mason and her father have always tried to stay one step ahead of the malevolent forces intent on their destruction. But on the eve of her 18th birthday, a dangerous revelation leads her deeper into a demonic world.

programme.title: X, (2022, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: A group of actors set out to make an adult film in rural Texas under the noses of their reclusive hosts, but when the elderly couple catches their young guests in the act, the cast finds themselves in a desperate fight for their lives.

programme.title: Pearl: An X-traordinary Origin Story, (2022, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Trapped on her family's isolated farm, Pearl must tend to her ailing father under the bitter, overbearing watch of her devout mother. Lusting for the glamorous life she's seen in the movies, Pearl's temptations and repressions collide.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Dio the Invader
programme.desc: On a stormy night in Victorian England, a coach carrying an aristocratic family meets with disaster, forever changing the fate of its sole survivors, George and Jonathan Joestar.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: A Letter From the Past
programme.desc: Hostility grows between Jonathan and his adopted brother, Dio, as forgotten secrets emerge. Do the sinister slums of London hold the secret to the mask and Jonathans suspicions?

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Jonathan and his new comrade, Speedwagon, confront Dio but are caught off guard when a savage reversal sends shock waves through the Joestar family.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Overdrive
programme.desc: Fate arranges the meeting of a broken Jonathan and the mysterious Zeppeli, master of Hamon energy. Meanwhile, one particularly savage vampire recruit hopes to slice his way to victory.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Dark Knights
programme.desc: Terror follows Jonathan and his fellow travelers to Windknights Lot, where they find themselves faced with the devious Dio. The onslaught of evil continues with two colossal knights.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Tomorrow's Courage
programme.desc: Just as Jonathans heroism transforms one foes hatred into humanity, an even greater behemoth drives the crew to a knightly training camp, complete with a medieval chamber of death.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Sorrowful Successor
programme.desc: Conquering his own fear, an unlikely star opens an opportunity for Zeppeli and Jonathan. But as a prophecy from Zeppelis past unfolds dramatically in a clash of life, death, and succession, a true hero triumphs.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bloody Battle! JoJo & Dio
programme.desc: With sword in hand and a team of Hamon masters at his side, Jonathan sets out to save Pocos sister. When one slithery demon makes its move, Jonathan steps in, igniting an all-out war with his brother.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Final Ripple!
programme.desc: Jonathan takes Erinas hand in marriage before embarking on a celebratory journey to America. But two stowaways unwittingly change the course of history for all those onboard.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: New York's JoJo
programme.desc: Its 1938, and hotheaded Londoner Joseph and his grandmother, Erina, have arrived in New York, where he wastes no time brandishing his innate tendenciesespecially when he learns of Speedwagons expedition.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon departs on a journey to take the Hunter Exam and meets Leorio and Kurapika who also want to be Hunters.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: If Gon, Leorio and Kurapika cannot answer an old woman's question correctly, they will be immediately disqualified.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Escorted by the Kiriko the trio finally arrive at the exam site.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The exam for the First Phase consists of following Satotz, the proctor to the site of the Second Phase.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Misty wetlands await the participants as they emerge from the long tunnel. Visibility is poor and various monsters lie in wait.
programme.sub-title: Hisoka x Is So x Sneaky

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Proctors Menchi and Buhara's test consists of preparing a dish that will satisfy the palate of Gourmet Hunters.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Netero challenges Gon and Killua to a simple game. If they win, they earn the right to become Hunters.
programme.sub-title: Showdown x On x The Airship

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The airship arrives at the site of the Third Phase. To pass this test, entrants must reach the base of the tower within 72 hours.
programme.sub-title: Decision x By x Majority Rule?

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon chooses the challenge where the person whose candle goes out first loses, but finds his candle has been tampered with

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Leorio loses patience as Kurapika refuses to deliver the final blow. An uneasy mood settles over the five as time continues to tick away.
programme.sub-title: The Trick x To x The Trick

programme.title: Death Note: Rebirth
programme.desc: Brilliant but bored high school student Light Yagami suddenly finds himself holding the power of life and death in his hand, the power of the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Confrontation
programme.desc: While the world's criminals continue to drop dead, L meets by computer with representatives from various nations.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: Death Note: Pursuit
programme.desc: Light, now known to the world as Kira, tests the Death Note to understand the scope of its powers by killing off six convicts in various ways.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Jotaro Kujo! Meets Josuke Higashikata
programme.desc: In April 1999, Jotaro Kujo travels to a town in Japan called Morioh to find a young man named Josuke Higashikata, the secret love child of his grandfather, Joseph Joestar. Upon finding him, Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Josuke Higashikata! Meets Angelo
programme.desc: Josuke informs Jotaro about his encounter with Angelos Stand. Deducing that the serial killers Stand is capable of entering peoples bodies, Jotaro tells Josuke over the phone to stay on high alert until he arrives at his home.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 1
programme.desc: Josuke and Jotaro learn that a man with a bow and arrow was responsible for awakening Angelos Stand ability. Realizing the town is still in danger, they decide to find the bow and arrow before it can create any more victims.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke enters the Nijimura Brothers house to rescue Koichi, who is in critical condition after getting shot by Keicho Nijimuras bow and arrow. But when Josuke steps into the house, he is attacked by Keichos Stand.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 3
programme.desc: After defeating Keicho, Koichi insists they find the bow and arrow and destroy it. Josuke agrees, but when the two enter the attic where the bow and arrow are being kept, they hear an inhuman noise inside.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Koichi Hirose (Reverb)
programme.desc: On his way to school, Koichi finds himself blackmailed by a man named Tamami Kobayashi, who frames him for running over a cat. A panicked Koichi starts to feel guilty for his actions when suddenly a giant lock appears on his chest!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Toshikazu Hazamada (Show Off)
programme.desc: Josuke and Koichi get info that a student at their school, Toshikazu Hazamada may be a Stand user and decide to look into the case. Their suspicions are quickly confirmed after Hazamadas wooden doll morphs into an exact copy of Josuke and attacks them.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1
programme.desc: Koichi is both surprised and excited when a girl named Yukako Yamagishi says she likes him. But Koichis joy quickly turns into fear after Yukako begins to express her love for him in very erratic and dangerous ways.
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1

programme.title: Welcome to Pine Hill, (2012, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Shanon, a reformed drug dealer, is now an insurance claims adjuster. In the days following a grim medical diagnosis he sets out to make peace with those around him and in turn find his own peace beyond the cacophony of New York City.

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, African-American Romance)
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing hes got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: In Too Deep, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Officer Cole is assigned to infiltrate the syndicate of God, a deadly crime lord. But as Cole sinks deeper into God's crew, he begins to get in over his head, until the line that separates his true identity from his street persona begins to disappear.

programme.title: The Last Black Man in San Francisco, (2019, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Jimmie & his best friend Mont try to reclaim the home built by Jimmie's grandfather, launching them on a poignant odyssey that connects them to their past, even as it tests their friendship & sense of belonging in the place they call home.

programme.title: The Inspection, (2022, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Rejected by his mother and with few options, a young, gay Black man joins the Marines, doing whatever it takes to succeed in a system that would cast him aside, unexpectedly finding camaraderie, strength, and support in this new community.

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, African-American Romance)
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing hes got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: In Too Deep, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Officer Cole is assigned to infiltrate the syndicate of God, a deadly crime lord. But as Cole sinks deeper into God's crew, he begins to get in over his head, until the line that separates his true identity from his street persona begins to disappear.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Historical Drama)

programme.title: Marshall, (2017, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: About a young Thurgood Marshall, the first African-American Supreme Court Justice, as he battles through one of his career-defining cases.

programme.title: Legacy Of Rage [English-Language Version], (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Brandon Ma is an average Joe, but his best friend, Michael, is a sinister drug dealer with a crush on Brandon's girlfriend, May. When Michael murders a dirty cop and frames his friend, sending him to jail, Brandon returns for vengeance.

programme.title: Drive, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: When a prototype 'enhanced human' on the run from hit men hooks up with a dread-locked bystander, the two elude their pursuers. Starring Brittany Murphy ("8 Mile").

programme.title: Honor and Glory, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: FBI agent Tracy Pride is on a mission to capture businessman Jason Slade, who is involved in extortion and murder. Teaming up with her is her sister Joyce, a news reporter; Dragon, Tracy's partner in Hong Kong, and Jake, a bodyguard who worked for Slade.

programme.title: Sworn to Justice, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: After attackers kill her sister and nephew, a female psychologist becomes a defense witness by day and avenger by night.

programme.title: Martial Law, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Sean Thompson and Billie Blake are a part of the L.A.P.D.'s new program called 'Martial Law'. When they begin to tangle with criminal and kung fu master Dalton Rhodes, it becomes personal...

programme.title: Martial Law II: Undercover, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Two undercover cops investigating a murder uncover a deadly ring of corruption at a nightclub where the rich are entertained by seductive women and protected by martial arts experts.

programme.title: Enter the Ninja, (1981, Action)

programme.desc: Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong, a one-man fighting machine. Serving in the army to avoid prison, Joe finds himself battling the deadly Black Star Order, as well as corrupt military leaders in order to bring down an illegal arms sale.

programme.title: American Ninja 2: The Confrontation, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: On a remote Caribbean island, Army Ranger Joe Armstrong saves an old friend from the clutches of "The Lion," an evil super-criminal who has kidnapped a local scientist and mass-produced an army of mutant Ninja warriors.

programme.desc: Crocodile Dundee returns in this hilarious third installment of the beloved film series. After Mick's girlfriend, Sue, is assigned to the L.A. bureau of her father's newspaper, Mick, Sue and their son Mikey head to Hollywood.

programme.title: Somebody Up There Likes Me, (2013, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Nick Offerman (Parks and Recreation) stumbles through life with his best friend and the woman they both adore (Jess Weixler) in this smart, subversive comedy about watching your life fly by.

programme.title: Superstar, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: All Mary Katherine Gallagher wants in life is a kiss. Not just any kiss, mind you a Hollywood-style kiss. But no matter how hard she tries, no one will kiss her. She decides that to get her kiss, she must become just like the people in the movies.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Superstar, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: All Mary Katherine Gallagher wants in life is a kiss. Not just any kiss, mind you a Hollywood-style kiss. But no matter how hard she tries, no one will kiss her. She decides that to get her kiss, she must become just like the people in the movies.

programme.title: Chasing Amy, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Cult comic-book artist Holden falls head-over-heals with fellow artist Alyssa, but for that love to live, he'll need to contend with his disapproving best friend Banky, her sexuality, and his own misgivings about himself in this Kevin Smith classic.

programme.title: The 4:30 Movie, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Kevin Smith's most personal film to date, a teenage cinephile tries to woo the girl of his dreams while dealing with a hilarious mix of friends and enemies at his local cinema.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: Death at a Funeral is a hilarious day in the life of an American family come together to put a beloved husband and father to rest.

programme.title: Joe Dirt, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Joe Dirt is a janitor with a mullet, acid-washed jeans, and a dream -- to find the parents he lost at the Grand Canyon when he was a belligerent, trailer park-raised kid. Now, the irrepressibly optimistic Joe hits the road in search of his folks.

programme.title: The Kill Room, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

programme.title: New York I Love You, (2008, Romance)
programme.desc: In the city that never sleeps, love is always on the mind. Those passions come to life in New York, I Love You, a collaboration of storytelling from some of today's most imaginative filmmakers and featuring an all-star cast.

programme.title: Things You Can Tell Just By Looking At Her, (2001, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A story comprised of five interweaving vignettes that focus on a particular group of women whose lives -- over the course of a few days -- become entangled, eroded, enriched and ultimately changed forever.

programme.title: A Little Bit of Heaven, (2011, Romance)

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Jersey Girl, (2004, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Lopez, and George Carlin headline this irresistible comedy from director Kevin Smith (CLERKS). It's a heartfelt tale of a suddenly-single father who must accept his identity, and acknowledge what makes him happy.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Love, Weddings & Other Disasters, (2020, Romance)
programme.desc: Diane Keaton, Jeremy Irons, and Maggie Grace lead this warmhearted romantic comedy that follows a colorful cast of characters searching for love against the backdrop of a wedding.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Jersey Girl, (2004, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Lopez, and George Carlin headline this irresistible comedy from director Kevin Smith (CLERKS). It's a heartfelt tale of a suddenly-single father who must accept his identity, and acknowledge what makes him happy.

programme.title: Memento, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.title: Wicker Park, (2004, Thriller)

programme.title: No Way Out, (1987, Action)

programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: The Illusionist, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar-winning performance).

programme.desc: The summer of 1964... Two FBI agents--one a tight-jawed, by-the-book type, the other an experienced Southern lawman who knows how to handle people--head the government's investigation into the disappearance of three civil rights activists in Mississippi.

programme.title: Not Easily Broken, (2009, Romance)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling novel by T.D. Jakes, a couple's strength and faith are tested after the wife is injured in a car crash and her husband becomes attracted to another woman.

programme.title: American Beauty, (1999, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Lester's life is far from perfect. As he makes a few changes in his life, the freer and the happier he gets. However, Lester is about to learn that the ultimate freedom comes at a price.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Western)

programme.title: Day of the Gun, (2013, Western)
programme.desc: Set in 1890's Montana, a conflict between the widowed Maggie Carter and cattle baron Cyrus McCall escalates into a 'range war' when McCall threatens her survival as a rancher by putting up a barbed...

programme.desc: Based on a true story. Sheriff Jacobson and Attorney Taylor investigate the disappearance of the Haven Family while facing a town bent on vengeance against suspect Charles Bannon.

programme.title: Damsel, (2018, Western)
programme.desc: A businessman travels West to join his fiance in the mountains.

programme.title: Brimstone, (2017, Western)
programme.desc: A triumphant thriller set in the menacing inferno of the old American West, Brimstone tells the story of Liz, a genuine survivor who is hunted by a vengeful Preacher for a crime she didnt commit.

programme.title: Jane Got a Gun, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this family action-comedy which centers on a man (Chan) who is called to baby-sit his neighbor's children and winds up having to fight off secret agents after one of the kids inadvertently downloads a secret code.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks, (2003, Adventure)

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Comedy)

programme.title: Mr. Mom, (1983, Comedy)

programme.title: The Mod Squad, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: Big screen version of the trend-setting 1960s television series, contemporizing the premise for the '90s. A trio of juvenile delinquents become undercover cops to infiltrate a drug ring in the ultra-hip L.A. club scene.

programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Breakin' All the Rules, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Inspired by his fiance (who dumped him), a man publishes a break-up hand-book for men, becoming a best-selling author in the process.

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: The Quick and the Dead, (1995, Western)
programme.desc: In this edgy and darkly humorous Western, a mysterious young woman rides into the lawless town of Redemption to settle an old score that has haunted her since she was a child. She becomes swept up in a deadly quick-draw tournament. Rated: R

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell & Mark Wahlberg face off in this Dad vs Step-Dad showdown! Brad (Ferrell) wants to be the best step-dad to his new wife's kids. But when their actual father Dusty (Wahlberg) shows up, the two must go toe-to-toe in this fun family comedy.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island, (1995, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

programme.title: Popeye, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary, beloved anvil-armed sailor of the seven seas comes magically to life in this delightful musical, starring Robin Williams as Popeye, who meets all challenges with the unshakable philosophy, "I yam what I yam and that's all that I yam."

programme.title: Over the Top, (1987, Adventure)
programme.desc: A Championship title, a huge cash award, and his son's love -- the greatest prize of all -- are at stake when Hawk battles his strongest enemy for everything he has ever wanted.

programme.title: Teen Witch, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: One week before her sixteenth birthday, a girl realizes that she is the descendant from one of the witches of Salem. She uses her newfound powers to snag herself the football-hero as her boyfriend and to become the most popular girl in school.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: Popeye, (1980, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary, beloved anvil-armed sailor of the seven seas comes magically to life in this delightful musical, starring Robin Williams as Popeye, who meets all challenges with the unshakable philosophy, "I yam what I yam and that's all that I yam."

programme.title: Heathers, (1970, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder, Christian Slater, and Shannen Doherty star in this cruelly hilarious dark comedy, which became one of the biggest cult classics of the `80s.

programme.title: Blue Velvet, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: A sensual mystery thriller about strange happenings in a small North Carolina town. A college student stumbles across a bizarre mystery and wants to know more, perhaps too much more.

programme.title: The Howling: New Moon Rising, (1995, Horror)
programme.desc: A number of brutal, werewolf-like slayings begin occurring in a small California town after the arrival of an unfamiliar motorcyclist.

programme.title: The Innkeepers, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: After over one hundred years of service, The Yankee Pedlar Inn is shutting its doors for good. The last remaining employees - Claire and Luke - are determined to uncover proof of what many believe to be one of New England's most haunted hotels.

programme.title: The Invitation, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: In this taut psychological thriller by Karyn Kusama (Girlfight, Jennifer's Body), the tension is palpable when Will shows up to his ex-wife Eden and new husband David's dinner party.

programme.title: The Invited, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A young married couple discovers that a great evil has resided in their new home for nearly a century.

programme.title: The Killer Nun, (1979, Italian Horror)
programme.desc: Legendary Swedish sex bomb Anita Ekberg stars as Sister Gertrude, a cruel nun who discovers depraved pleasure in a frenzy of drug addiction, sexual degradation and sadistic murder.

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of medical researchers discover a way to bring dead patients back to life.

programme.title: The Legend of La Llorona, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: A malevolent spirit preys on a family in Mexico. As they fight to save their son from the vengeful entity, they uncover a secret from Carly's past that may hold the key to defeating La Llorona.

programme.title: The Little Girl Who Lives Down The Lane, (1976, Horror)
programme.desc: Jodie Foster and Martin Sheen star in this haunting story of a thirteen-year-old girl who lives in an old house with her reclusive father...all alone. Or does she? It seems she is hiding a dark secret, one she is determined to preserve. At any cost!

programme.title: The Little Mermaid, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Beauty is both deceiving and dangerous in this dark twist on Hans Christian Andersen's classic tale, as an underwater discovery draws an innocent man into a mermaid's evil world.

programme.title: The Love Witch, (2016, Horror)
programme.desc: A modern-day witch uses spells and magic to get men to fall in love with her, in a tribute to 1960s Technicolor thrillers.

programme.title: The Beastmaster, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.

programme.title: Dragonslayer, (1981, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The young wizarding apprentice Galen, is sent to kill a dragon which has been devouring girls from a nearby kingdom. Will his magic be enough to save him?

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: The Philadelphia Experiment, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this classic sci-fi thriller, a US Navy destroyer escort participates in an invisibility experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors forty years into the future. Starring Michael Par, Nancy Allen and Stephen Tobolowsky.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: The Wraith, (1986, Horror)
programme.desc: Jake is killed by neighborhood thugs, and returns as a mystical figure (The Wraith) to gain revenge. Starring Charlie Sheen and Randy Quaid.

programme.title: Christine, (1983, Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Stephen King, CHRISTINE tells the story of a 1957 Plymouth that takes on human characteristics.

programme.title: Three Amigos!, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: Steve Martin, Chevy Chase and Martin Short are three wild and crazy caballeros in this comedy adventure thats a fiesta of fun. Co-starring Phil Hartman and Jon Lovitz, the 'Three Amigos!' blaze a side-splitting trail across the comedy frontier!

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: Michael J. Crocodile Dundee is a free-spirited Australian who hunts crocodiles with his bare hands, stares down giant water buffaloes, and drinks mere mortals under the table.

programme.title: Beowulf, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After Beowulf, the mightiest warrior of all, destroyes the overpowering demon Grendel, he incurs wrath of the beast's mother to seek out revenge.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When mysterious giant robots begin attacking the streets of New York City, intrepid reporter Polly Perkins is on the story and enlists the aid of ace aviator and old flame Joseph 'Sky Captain' Sullivan.
